data.title: Early Round Shops Slow Orb from Art
data.description: Here's an early round Slow Orb for Mid Shops from A Art, that can be used to slow the enemy team's early round aggression into Mid.

data.title: Early Round Mid Doors Passive Barrier Orb
data.description: Here's a great wall to place for Mid Doors at the beginning of the round to make it much more difficult for enemy players to push through Mid Doors.
